metadata.title: CVE-2002-0389 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2002-0389` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mailman - 1:2.1.8-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mailman package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.1.8-2').
